title: EduSage
description: A full-stack smart education management system designed to streamline academic workflows using AI-driven features. Includes student management, analytics, and intelligent automation tools.
quote: Making education smarter, one algorithm at a time.

title: MoneyOS
description: An AI-driven personal finance operating system that analyzes spending behavior, enforces adaptive budgets, predicts affordability, and provides real-time financial intelligence using Google Gemini AI.
quote: Your wallet's new best friend with a brain.

title: Writeful Thinking
description: An advanced AI text humanization tool that converts robotic, AI-generated content into natural, engaging, and undetectable human-like writing using Google Gemini. Supports tone control, real-time streaming, and AI detection analysis.
quote: Turning robot speak into human art.

title: ThinkLikeYou
description: A privacy-first AI decision-making and digital twin system that models a user's linguistic fingerprints, behavioral traits, and decision heuristics to generate highly personalized, transparent, and evolving AI responses.

title: Otaku Log
description: A universal tracking platform to log, organize, and monitor progress across manga, anime, manhwa, books, and other media in a single, centralized system.
quote: One log to track them all.

title: Wave Habitat
description: A hardware-software integrated system developed during internship at Arms Robotics, enabling real-time interaction with company hardware and automation modules.
